org.prolog4j.swi
Class SWIPrologProverFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.prolog4j.AbstractProverFactory
      org.prolog4j.swi.SWIPrologProverFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProverFactory
public final class SWIPrologProverFactory
extends AbstractProverFactory

An implementation of IProverFactory which always returns the same SWIPrologProver instance. SWI-Prolog does not support multiple Prolog engines.
